item.text: Then Jesus left that place and went to the region of Judea and beyond the Jordan River. Again crowds gathered to him, and again, as was his custom, he taught them.

<st data-num="2532" class="">Then</st> some <st data-num="5330" class="">Pharisees</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="4334" class="">came</st>, and to <st data-num="3985" class="">test</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st><n id="2" /> they <st data-num="1905" class="">asked</st>, “Is it <st data-num="1832" class="">lawful</st> for a <st data-num="435" class="">man</st> to <st data-num="630" class="">divorce</st> his<n id="3" /> <st data-num="1135" class="">wife</st>?”<n id="4" />

He <st data-num="611" class="">answered</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>,<n id="1" /> “<st data-num="5101">What</st> did <st data-num="3475" class="">Moses</st> <st data-num="1781" class="">command</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>?”
They said, “Moses permitted a man to write a certificate of dismissal and to divorce her.”

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="3004">said</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>, “He <st data-num="1125" class="">wrote</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st> <st data-num="1785" class="">commandment</st> for <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="4314">because of</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="4641">hard hearts</st>.<n id="1" />
But from the beginning of creation he made them male and female.
For this reason a man will leave his father and mother,
and the two will become one flesh. So they are no longer two, but one flesh.
Therefore what God has joined together, let no one separate.”
In the house once again, the disciples asked him about this.

<st data-num="2532" class="">So</st><n id="1" /> he <st data-num="3004" class="">told</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>, “<st data-num="3739">Whoever</st> <st data-num="630" class="">divorces</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="1135" class="">wife</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1060" class="">marries</st> <st data-num="243" class="">another</st> <st data-num="3429">commits adultery</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">against</st> <st data-num="846" class="">her</st>.
And if she divorces her husband and marries another, she commits adultery.”
Now people were bringing little children to him for him to touch, but the disciples scolded those who brought them.

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> when <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="1492" class="">saw</st> this, he was <st data-num="23" class="">indignant</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3004">said</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>, “<st data-num="863" class="">Let</st> the <st data-num="3813">little children</st> <st data-num="2064" class="">come</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">to</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st> and do <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> try to <st data-num="2967" class="">stop</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>, <st data-num="1063" class="">for</st> the <st data-num="932" class="">kingdom</st> of <st data-num="2316">God</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1510" class="">belongs to</st> <st data-num="5108">such as these</st>.<n id="2" />

I <st data-num="3004" class="">tell</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> the <st data-num="281" class="">truth</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="3739">whoever</st> does <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> <st data-num="1209" class="">receive</st><n id="2" /> the <st data-num="932" class="">kingdom</st> of <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> <st data-num="5613" class="">like</st> a <st data-num="3813" class="">child</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="1525" class="">will</st> <st data-num="3756" class="">never</st><n id="4" /> <st data-num="1525" class="">enter</st> <st data-num="846" class="">it</st>.”
After he took the children in his arms, he placed his hands on them and blessed them.
Now as Jesus was starting out on his way, someone ran up to him, fell on his knees, and said, “Good teacher, what must I do to inherit eternal life?”

<st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>, “<st data-num="5101">Why</st> do you <st data-num="3004" class="">call</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st> <st data-num="18" class="">good</st>?<n id="1" /> <st data-num="3762">No one</st> is <st data-num="18" class="">good</st> <st data-num="1508">except</st> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> <st data-num="1520" class="">alone</st>.
You know the commandments: ‘Do not murder, do not commit adultery, do not steal, do not give false testimony, do not defraud, honor your father and mother.’”

The man<n id="1" /> <st data-num="5346" class="">said</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>, “<st data-num="1320">Teacher</st>, I have <st data-num="5442">wholeheartedly obeyed</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> <st data-num="3778">these</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">laws</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="1537" class="">since</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">my</st> <st data-num="3503" class="">youth</st>.”<n id="4" />

As <st data-num="2424">Jesus</st> <st data-num="1689">looked at</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>, he <st data-num="25">felt love</st> for <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3004">said</st>, “<st data-num="4771">You</st> <st data-num="5302" class="">lack</st> <st data-num="1520">one thing</st>. <st data-num="5217" class="">Go</st>, <st data-num="4453" class="">sell</st> <st data-num="3745" class="">whatever</st> you <st data-num="2192" class="">have</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1325" class="">give</st> the money<n id="1" /> to the <st data-num="4434" class="">poor</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> you will <st data-num="2192" class="">have</st> <st data-num="2344" class="">treasure</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="3772" class="">heaven</st>. <st data-num="2532" class="">Then</st> <st data-num="1204" class="">come</st>, <st data-num="190" class="">follow</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st>.”
But at this statement, the man looked sad and went away sorrowful, for he was very rich.
Then Jesus looked around and said to his disciples, “How hard it is for the rich to enter the kingdom of God!”

The <st data-num="3101" class="">disciples</st> were <st data-num="2284" class="">astonished</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">at</st> <st data-num="846" class="">these</st> <st data-num="3056" class="">words</st>. <st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> <st data-num="3825" class="">again</st> <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="3004">said</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>,<n id="1" /> “<st data-num="5043">Children</st>, <st data-num="4459" class="">how</st> <st data-num="1422" class="">hard</st> it <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="1519" class="">to</st> <st data-num="1525" class="">enter</st> the <st data-num="932" class="">kingdom</st> of <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st>!

It <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="2123" class="">easier</st> for a <st data-num="2574" class="">camel</st><n id="1" /> to <st data-num="1330">go through</st> the <st data-num="5168" class="">eye</st> of a <st data-num="4476" class="">needle</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="2228" class="">than</st> for a <st data-num="4145">rich person</st> to <st data-num="1525" class="">enter</st> the <st data-num="932" class="">kingdom</st> of <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st>.”

They were <st data-num="4057">even more</st> <st data-num="1605" class="">astonished</st> and <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="4314" class="">to</st> <st data-num="1438">one another</st>, “<st data-num="2523">Then</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="5101" class="">who</st> <st data-num="1410" class="">can</st> be <st data-num="4982" class="">saved</st>?”<n id="3" />
Jesus looked at them and replied, “This is impossible for mere humans, but not for God; all things are possible for God.”
Peter began to speak to him, “Look, we have left everything to follow you!”

<st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="5346" class="">said</st>, “I <st data-num="3004" class="">tell</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> the <st data-num="281" class="">truth</st>,<n id="1" /> there <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="3762" class="">no one</st> <st data-num="3739" class="">who</st> has <st data-num="863" class="">left</st> <st data-num="3614" class="">home</st> <st data-num="2228" class="">or</st> <st data-num="80" class="">brothers</st> <st data-num="2228" class="">or</st> <st data-num="79" class="">sisters</st> <st data-num="2228" class="">or</st> <st data-num="3384" class="">mother</st> <st data-num="2228" class="">or</st> <st data-num="3962" class="">father</st> <st data-num="2228" class="">or</st> <st data-num="5043" class="">children</st> <st data-num="2228" class="">or</st> <st data-num="68" class="">fields</st> <st data-num="1752" class="">for</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">my</st> <st data-num="1752">sake</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1752" class="">for the sake of</st> the <st data-num="2098" class="">gospel</st>

<st data-num="1437" class="">who</st> will <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> <st data-num="2983" class="">receive</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st> <st data-num="2540">age</st><n id="1" /> a <st data-num="1542">hundred times as much</st>—<st data-num="3614" class="">homes</st>, <st data-num="80" class="">brothers</st>, <st data-num="79" class="">sisters</st>, <st data-num="3384" class="">mothers</st>, <st data-num="5043" class="">children</st>, <st data-num="68" class="">fields</st>, all <st data-num="3326" class="">with</st> <st data-num="1375" class="">persecutions</st><n id="2" />—<st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="165" class="">age</st> to <st data-num="2064" class="">come</st>, <st data-num="166" class="">eternal</st> <st data-num="2222" class="">life</st>.<n id="3" />
But many who are first will be last, and the last first.”

They were on the way, going up to Jerusalem. Jesus was going ahead of them, and they were amazed, but those who followed were afraid. He took the Twelve aside again and began to tell them what was going to happen to him.

“<st data-num="2400">Look</st>, we are <st data-num="305">going up</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">to</st> <st data-num="2414" class="">Jerusalem</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> the <st data-num="5207" class="">Son</st> of <st data-num="444" class="">Man</st> will be <st data-num="3860" class="">handed over</st> to the <st data-num="749" class="">chief priests</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1122" class="">experts in the law</st>.<n id="1" /> They will <st data-num="2632" class="">condemn</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> to <st data-num="2288" class="">death</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> will <st data-num="3860" class="">turn</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> <st data-num="3860">over</st> to the <st data-num="1484" class="">Gentiles</st>.
They will mock him, spit on him, flog him severely, and kill him. Yet after three days, he will rise again.”
Then James and John, the sons of Zebedee, came to him and said, “Teacher, we want you to do for us whatever we ask.”

He <st data-num="3004">said</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>, “<st data-num="5101">What</st> <st data-num="4160" class="">do</st> you <st data-num="2309" class="">want</st> <st data-num="1473">me</st> to <st data-num="4160" class="">do</st> for <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>?”

They <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>, “<st data-num="1325">Permit</st> <st data-num="1520" class="">one</st> of <st data-num="1473" class="">us</st> <st data-num="2443">to</st> <st data-num="2523" class="">sit</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">at</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="1188">right hand</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> the <st data-num="1520" class="">other</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">at</st> your <st data-num="710" class="">left</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="1391" class="">glory</st>.”

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="3004">said</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>, “You <st data-num="3756">don’t</st> <st data-num="1492" class="">know</st> <st data-num="5101" class="">what</st> you are <st data-num="154" class="">asking</st>! Are you <st data-num="1410" class="">able</st> to <st data-num="4095" class="">drink</st> the <st data-num="4221" class="">cup</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">I</st> <st data-num="4095" class="">drink</st> <st data-num="2228" class="">or</st> be <st data-num="907" class="">baptized</st> with the <st data-num="908" class="">baptism</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">I</st> <st data-num="907" class="">experience</st>?”<n id="1" />

They <st data-num="3004">said</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>, “We are <st data-num="1410" class="">able</st>.”<n id="1" /> <st data-num="1161" class="">Then</st> <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="3004">said</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>, “You will <st data-num="4095" class="">drink</st> the <st data-num="4221" class="">cup</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">I</st> <st data-num="4095" class="">drink</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> you will be <st data-num="907" class="">baptized</st> with the <st data-num="908" class="">baptism</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">I</st> <st data-num="907" class="">experience</st>,
but to sit at my right or at my left is not mine to give. It is for those for whom it has been prepared.”
Now when the other 10 heard this, they became angry with James and John.

<st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="4341" class="">called</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>, “You <st data-num="1492" class="">know</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> those who are <st data-num="1380" class="">recognized</st> as <st data-num="757" class="">rulers</st> of the <st data-num="1484" class="">Gentiles</st> <st data-num="2634" class="">lord</st> it <st data-num="2634" class="">over</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> those in <st data-num="3173" class="">high positions</st> <st data-num="2715">use</st> <st data-num="846" class="">their</st> <st data-num="2715" class="">authority over</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>.

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> it <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="3779">this way</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">among</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>. <st data-num="235" class="">Instead</st> <st data-num="3739" class="">whoever</st> <st data-num="2309" class="">wants</st> to <st data-num="1096">be</st> <st data-num="3173" class="">great</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">among</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> must <st data-num="1510" class="">be</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="1249" class="">servant</st>,

<st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3739">whoever</st> <st data-num="2309" class="">wants</st> to <st data-num="1510" class="">be</st> <st data-num="4413" class="">first</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">among</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> must <st data-num="1510" class="">be</st> the <st data-num="1401" class="">slave</st><n id="1" /> of <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st>.
For even the Son of Man did not come to be served but to serve, and to give his life as a ransom for many.”
They came to Jericho. As Jesus and his disciples and a large crowd were leaving Jericho, Bartimaeus the son of Timaeus, a blind beggar, was sitting by the road.

When he <st data-num="191" class="">heard</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> it <st data-num="1510" class="">was</st> <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> the <st data-num="3479" class="">Nazarene</st>, he <st data-num="757">began</st> to <st data-num="3004" class="">shout</st>,<n id="1" /> “<st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st>, <st data-num="5207">Son</st> of <st data-num="1138" class="">David</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="1653">have mercy</st><n id="3" /> on <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st>!”

<st data-num="4183" class="">Many</st> <st data-num="2008" class="">scolded</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> <st data-num="4623" class="">to</st> get <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> to be <st data-num="4623" class="">quiet</st>, <st data-num="1161" class="">but</st> he <st data-num="2896" class="">shouted</st> <st data-num="4183" class="">all</st> the <st data-num="3123">more</st>, “<st data-num="5207" class="">Son</st> of <st data-num="1138" class="">David</st>, <st data-num="1653">have mercy</st> on <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st>!”

<st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="2476" class="">stopped</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st>, “<st data-num="5455" class="">Call</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>.” <st data-num="2532" class="">So</st><n id="1" /> they <st data-num="5455" class="">called</st> the <st data-num="5185">blind man</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>, “<st data-num="2293" class="">Have courage</st>! <st data-num="1453">Get up</st>! He is <st data-num="5455" class="">calling</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>.”

He <st data-num="577">threw off</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="2440" class="">cloak</st>, <st data-num="450">jumped up</st>, and <st data-num="2064" class="">came</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">to</st> <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st>.

<st data-num="2532">Then</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="611" class="">said</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>,<n id="2" /> “<st data-num="5101">What</st> do <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="2309" class="">want</st> me to <st data-num="4160" class="">do</st> for <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>?” The <st data-num="5185">blind man</st> <st data-num="3004">replied</st>, “<st data-num="4462">Rabbi</st>,<n id="3" /> let me <st data-num="308">see again</st>.”<n id="4" />
Jesus said to him, “Go, your faith has healed you.” Immediately he regained his sight and followed him on the road.
